verses.verse: You <S%G4771><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> son <S%G5043><s%>, be strong <S%G1743><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> that is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

In <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I suffer trouble <S%G2553><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> an evil doer <S%G2557><s%>, even unto <S%G3360><s%> chains <S%G1199><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G1210><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%>.

If <S%G1487><s%> we believe not <S%G569><s%>, yet he <S%G1565><s%> stays <S%G3306><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%>: he can <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> deny <S%G720><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> shun <S%G4026><s%> profane <S%G952><s%> and vain babblings <S%G2757><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> they will increase <S%G4298><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> ungodliness <S%G763><s%>.
